question: Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat.Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letterexplain the reasons for the noiseapologisedescribe what action you will take
text: I would like to apologize for noising because I installed new fibre in my flat and it involved drilling and cable laying works.

To begin with, we have a new fibre installation at our home as we cannot use our internet and fibre  was broken by the rat. Therefore, the installation took two working days and it involved drilling at the home's wall that made the noise. I am deeply sorry for that as I would not let your home know about my work as some part of the work involved night jobs cable laying. Moreover, I apologize for my mistake that I should have requested you to get permission from you to pass fibre near your falt.

As far as I know that I will be more careful and if I have to do those kinds of work in the future, I will let my neighbour know and get permission from both you and building management. I appreciate it if you could understand my conditions and accept my apologies.
